attributes.action: Shut the bar, ban alcohol in government as punishment for breaking covid law.
attributes.additional_details: Ban alcohol and test everyone working in Parliament for drugs regularly and accurately. COCAINE was found, so test all staff especially MP's and their staff. They are consistently letting the country down. The severe lack of professionalism at the highest levels of government has a trickledown effect. You are the country's worst role models. To show the british public you are serious about improving you must close the commons bar and ban all alcohol on site. Apart from the PM's appartment.
attributes.background: There is a lack of professionalism in government, we the public demand that no alcohol be permitted   on the premises of the houses of Parliament and other offices of government, we theirfore demand to make government a dry place. We the people also want random weekly drug tests to take place
